mapper.select: SELECT a.*, f.StarterName AS starterName, b. STATUS AS STATUS, cwo.cj_contract_code, CASE WHEN cwo.cj_contract_code IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN "" THEN 0 WHEN "Null" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as cwoState FROM fb_contract_over AS a LEFT JOIN mode_status AS b ON a.fco_id = b.mode_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mode_id, StarterName FROM ( SELECT * FROM flowhistroy ORDER BY do_date ASC ) f LEFT JOIN fb_contract_over a ON a.fco_id = f.mode_id GROUP BY mode_id ) AS f ON a.fco_id = f.mode_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cw.* FROM contract_work cw LEFT JOIN mode_status AS b ON cw.cw_id = b.mode_id WHERE b. STATUS = 2 AND cw.type = 2 ) cwo ON cwo.cj_contract_code = a.cj_contract WHERE ( b. STATUS = 1 OR b. STATUS = 2 OR b. STATUS = 3 )
mapper.update: update fb_contract_over set fb_contract=#{fb.fbContract}, fb_name=#{fb.fbName}, fb_money=#{fb.fbMoney}, fb_end_money=#{fb.fbEndMoney}, cj_contract=#{fb.cjContract}, cj_name=#{fb.cjName}, prj_code=#{fb.prjCode}, settlement_time=#{fb.settlementTime}, work_info=#{fb.workInfo}, qianqi_jy_money=#{fb.qianqijyMoney}, is_kouchu=#{fb.isKouchu} where fco_id=#{fb.fcoId}
